Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell based fluidized bed configuration is employed for the first time to convert solid carbon directly into electricity.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell

Sentencas: Current-voltage characteristics exhibited typical fuel cell behavior with large ohmic losses.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell

Sentencas: Chromatographic analysis of the product gases in the flue strewn confirmed conversion of carbon.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell

Sentencas: This is also verified by oxygen mass balance.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell

Sentencas: Peak power densities for carbon compared well with benchmarking tests that employed only gaseous fuels.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell

Sentencas: A possible mechanistic pathway is proposed to explain the observed behavior.
Titulo: Direct carbon conversion in a helium fluidized bed fuel cell
